metadata.title: CVE-2023-21886 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization (component: Core). Supported versions that are affected are Prior to 6.1.42 and prior to 7.0.6. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Oracle VM VirtualBox. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle VM VirtualBox. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 8.1 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

advisory.discovered_by: Exist (exist91240480) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
